verbose_text: Furthermore, our biochemical data define an intracellular trafficking pathway consisting of Ndfip adaptor proteins and HECT E3 ubiquitin ligases that act together to promote Robo1 ubiquitylation and its subsequent degradation in lysosomal and proteasomal compartments.
evidence: E3 ubiquitin ligases that act together to promote Robo1 ubiquitylation
